name: UpdateProblemNote
description:
Update a note on an existing problem in Freshservice.

This tool updates an existing note on a specified problem in Freshservice. Use this when you need to modify details or correct information in a note associated with a problem.

parameters.name: problem_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the problem to update the note for.

parameters.name: note_id
parameters.description: ID of the note to be updated.

parameters.name: note_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the note to be updated.

parameters.name: creator_user_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the user who originally created the note. This is necessary for update operations to ensure the note's authorship is correctly handled.

value_schema.description: Unique ID of the user who created the note

parameters.name: notification_email_addresses
parameters.description: List of email addresses to notify about the note update.

value_schema.description: Addresses to which the note must be notified to

parameters.name: note_body_html
parameters.description: The body of the note in HTML format for updating an existing note.

value_schema.description: The body of the note in HTML format

parameters.name: note_body_text
parameters.description: The content of the note in plain text format for the problem note update.

value_schema.description: The body of the note in plain text format

parameters.name: note_created_datetime
parameters.description: The datetime when the note was initially created in ISO 8601 format (e.g., '2023-03-10T10:00:00Z').

value_schema.description: Date time at which the note was created

parameters.name: note_update_datetime
parameters.description: The date and time at which the note was updated, in ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Date time at which the note was updated

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the user who created the note

value_schema.description: Unique ID of the user who created the note

parameters.name: notify_emails
parameters.description: Addresses to which the note must be notified to

value_schema.description: Addresses to which the note must be notified to

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The body of the note in HTML format

value_schema.description: The body of the note in HTML format

parameters.name: body_text
parameters.description: The body of the note in plain text format

value_schema.description: The body of the note in plain text format

parameters.name: created_at
parameters.description: Date time at which the note was created

value_schema.description: Date time at which the note was created

parameters.name: updated_at
parameters.description: Date time at which the note was updated

value_schema.description: Date time at which the note was updated
